fields.text: Thank you for calling Rigetti Computing in the East Bay, your gateway to quantum cloud services.
For quantum cloud service support, press [INDEX].
For account setup and onboarding, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our onboarding team.
Please hold while we transfer you to a technical specialist.
To learn more about our quantum computing solutions, press [INDEX].
If you have questions about pricing, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we gather pricing information for you.
If you want to speak with sales, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our sales representative.
